duties_responsibilities.duty: Support engineering ECM technical leads with field returns, New Product Introduction testing, and other activities as needed.
Intake field returns and enter/update return data.
Ship returns to suppliers and follow up for root cause analysis.
Assist with functional emissions and/or environmental testing.
Interact with the testing team to fulfill technical requirements provided by the tech lead.

education_certification.credential: Associate’s degree in engineering technology or related field required. Two-year technical certification within electronics focus is also acceptable.
